abstract.t: This memo provides the background and motivations for the recommendations made in draft-kowack-rfc-editor-model-v2-overview-00. It represents the perspectives resulting from an individual managerial and analytical effort of nearly one year's duration. It contains a summary of the factors considered to be essential to the job of RFC Series Editor (RSE). This includes a summary of the work done as part of the RFC Editor, the differences between [RFC5620]and the [I-D.v2-overview] recommendations, a discussion of development work that should be done, and an assessment of the time needed to perform the RSE job. There is also a section listing and responding to questions surrounding the recommendations.
